channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: On the corners of 31 and 32 Windmill Street, 31st December
item.description:
Two abandoned bicycles here for many weeks. Can they vibe removed please? Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Windmill Street, Bloomsbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: X2 flags need taking down here ASAP, 31st December
item.description:
Right by the Sikh temple and in a family area - x2 flags on one lamppost here need removing please ASAP as causing offence and tension and making us all uncomfortable who live here Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Gulley, 31st December
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 31/12/25 13:33 Blocked Street Drains/Gullies Lat/Long - 51.4173418, -0.0239146 what3words - patch.sounds.trade Nearest address - 23 Littlestone Close, Beckenham, BR3 1UE Southend Road . Opposite Shannon Way. Please clear blocked Gully Reference - 5216156 Map link - open Google map Report history - Status: Open 31/12/2025 13:32 Southend Road . Opposite Shannon Way. Please clear blocked Gully
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Flytipping outside no.87 (Again!), 31st December
item.description:
I've reported to envirocrime email already, with evidence that this has been dumped by the residents of 87 Kingsground. Please can it be collected, and the serial-fly-tippers living at this address actually dealt with.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsground, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Few Flags on road still left causing community tension, 31st December
item.description:
The flags remaining on Pembroke Road are causing tension for those of us here and need removing please urgently. It’s a new year and we want our area to feel safe and like we can walk through our street safely.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pembroke Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping all along battle road again, 31st December
item.description:
Flytipping and dumping of large rubbish in this spot AND all along the railway line at battle road again as the bi-weekly clean up has NOT taken place here as it should have done on Sunday - this all needs urgently clearing up as it’s a real mess for all of us living here
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner of Montague Place and Montague Street, 31st December
item.description:
This mess has been here for months if not years. Can it really not be fixed? Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Russell Square, Bloomsbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ivy, 31st December
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 31/12/25 13:15 Grass Verges and Shrub - Maintenance Lat/Long - 51.4331255, 0.047162 what3words - mixed.talked.translated Nearest address - 10 Albert Road, Mottingham, London, SE9 4SW Ivy has been cut recently in Shottery Close on the fence alongside Albert Road. The remaining branches are now hanging over the fence and pulling it down into the back garden of the flats in Albert Road. Remaining ivy branches need cutting and removing. Reference - 5216092 Map link - open Google map Report history - Status: Received 31/12/2025 13:14 Ivy has been cut recently in Shottery Close on the fence alongside Albert Road. The remaining branches are now hanging over the fence and pulling it down into the back garden of the flats in Albert Road. Remaining ivy branches need cutting and removing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shottery Close, Mottingham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Opposite 70 Great Russell Street, 31st December
item.description:
Reinstatement has failed. Blockeprk missing. Big dip where tarmac has been put in place. Can it be fixed please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Great Russell Street, Bloomsbury, Greater London

item.title: Old can tyre dumped in Friern Road, 31st December
item.description:
Someone has dumped an old tyre in the road at the bottom end of Friern Road. There is no private owned organisation to deal with this, so reporting again. This was dumped here a number of weeks ago. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Friern Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen barriers outside poundland, 31st December
item.description:
Fallen barriers impossible to pass by causing people to walk in the road trip hazzard and not visable in the dark serious accident waiting to happen
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 141, High Street, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Newly planted tree needs attention, 31st December
item.description:
Newly planted tree is tied to supporting stake. Stake leans over and does not hold tree in vertical plane. Tree could take root, unsightly and dangerous due to limited headroom from overhead branches
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Towncourt Lane, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gravel on footpath, 31st December
item.description:
There are heaps of gravel over the pavement outside the house near the junction of Newlyn Road and Lulworth Road. It is coming from the driveway of this house but never gets swept back. Please could you investigate
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newlyn Road, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grafitti on bridge overpass of Newington Causeway (91), 31st December
item.description:
Hi - there has been graffiti (reoccurring) on the overpass of the bridge on Newington Causeway. I believe it currently reads "Hot Sex" on the side by my flat (91 Newington Causeway). Could this please be removed and if possible, something be done where new graffiti can't appear right after it's cleaned? Many thanks in advance, really appreciate it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newington Causeway, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti in the A2 underpass, 31st December
item.description:
Please remove the graffiti in the A2 underpass ASAP. Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bramshot Avenue, Charlton

item.category: Street cleaning - Grass verges / Shrub beds - Littering

item.title: Multiple lights out on Newington Ct by arches, 31st December
item.description:
Hello - there are multiple lights out on Newington Ct - the street/alley that runs by the arches between Ministry of Sound and Mercato. It's very unsafe and I have to use my phone's light to get through on my way to the shops. Can you please fix the lights? Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Newington Causeway, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
